content: meet the everglade cowl a beautiful crochet pattern using worsted weight yarn this crocheted cowl works up fairly quickly and uses a combination of puff stitches chains and single_crochet to make a lovely fabric because the pattern is so easily adjustable there is no gauge included be creative and make this cowl perfect for you a free version is available here https //desertblossomcrafts com/adjustable-ear-warmer-crochet-pattern/ or purchase the ad-free pdf above here on ravelry inside you will find instructions written in us crochet terms but you must already know the basics of crochet materials needed - worsted weight yarn i used malabrigo rios - i/5 5mm crochet hook - yarn needle finished measurements fully adjustable for length and width stitch multiples are given skill level advanced beginner when you purchase this item you will receive an immediate download link for your pattern it is a pdf file terms of use this pattern is my original design it is for private use only please do not redistribute or resell it in any way if you have any questions please contact me and i will do my best to help
